subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Bruins and Rangers open their second-round N.H.L. playoff series in Boston on Thursday. Since their last meeting, on Feb. 12, both teams made significant changes.
snippet: The Bruins and Rangers open their second-round N.H.L. playoff series in Boston on Thursday. Since their last meeting, on Feb. 12, both teams made significant changes.
